lead_paragraph: The country will probably cut interest rates and encourage banks to increase lending, after the pace of economic expansion was its slowest in six years.

headline.print_headline: Weak Growth is Expected to Push Beijing into Action
headline.main: In China, Weak Growth Is Expected to Push Beijing Into Action

snippet: The country will probably cut interest rates and encourage banks to increase lending, after the pace of economic expansion was its slowest in six years.
